downloadTitle: A Comprehensive Guide to Project Online
downloadDescription: Project Online is the Project Portfolio Management component service in Office 365.  It is procured as a standalone service or added as part of an Office 365 Enterprise (E ) Service Plan.
detailsSection: This white paper provides comprehensive guidance for technical decision makers who are considering a Project Portfolio Management Information System in the cloud with Office 365/Project Online rather than the traditional, on-premises version of Project Server.
installInstructionSection:
1. Click the Download button in the upper right corner of this page to start the download.
  2. Click Save or Save this program to disk.
  3. Find the file on your hard disk and double-click it to open it.
